static void ctk_mutex_lock ( ctk_mutex_ea_t  mutex  )  [inline, static]

Acquires a simple mutex lock. It will wait if the lock is held by any PPU/SPU.

Parameters:
[in] mutex - a mutex reference to be acquired.

static int ctk_mutex_trylock ( ctk_mutex_ea_t  mutex  )  [inline, static]

Tries to acquire a mutex lock.

Parameters:
[in] mutex - a mutex reference to be tried.
Returns:
0 if successfully locked, CTK_ERROR_BUSY (non-zero) otherwise.

static void ctk_mutex_unlock ( ctk_mutex_ea_t  mutex  )  [inline, static]
